articles.author: Brett McMurphy
articles.title: Miami bidding to be 3rd largest underdog to win title in BCS or College Football Playoff era - On3
articles.description: Since Miami was selected as the final team in the College Football Playoff, the Hurricanes have faced long odds to win their first national title since 2001. Now they must overcome even more. Miami is an 8½-point underdog to Indiana, according to BetMGM. The …
articles.content:
